parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

paymentMethod.description: The type of method used for the payment

currentEndDate.description: Identifies the Current End Date of the Standing Order for the Currency,

counterPartyAccountId.description: The identifier of the counter party's account

beneficiaryAccountId.description: The identifier of the beneficiary account

beneficiaryReference.description: The reference associated with the beneficiary and used as the default reference on any payments made to the beneficiary

accountWithBank.description: Identifies the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

currentAmountBalance.description: The amount of the Standing Order, or for the Balance Maintenance Standing Order types, will define the Balance to be maintained in the Account.Balance Maintenance Standing Order types will always make reference to the CLEARED Balance.

paymentDetail.description: Identifies the Payment Details to enable the Beneficiary to apply the payment.

bankSortCode.description: Defines the bank sorting code of the bank and branch. The code entered must exist as a sort code. 6 numeric characters.

beneficiaryIBAN.description: The IBAN of the beneficiary's account

beneficiaryBIC.description: BIC (Bank Identifier Code) of the beneficiary customer

beneficiaryBICName.description: The name displayed of the beneficiary BIC

beneficiaryBICCity.description: The city of the beneficiary BIC

currentFrequencyDate.description: Identifies the date component of field CURRENT.FREQUENCY- The Standing Order Application will execute the Standing Order instruction (i.e. the currency and amount specified in the two previous fields) according to the frequency specified in this field

override.description: Records the override messages generated during processing of an activity.

paymentOrderProductName.description: The name that is displayed for the paymentOrderProduct

beneficiaryCharge.description: Determines where the beneficiary bears charges

accountWithBankIBAN.description: IBAN of Account with Bank being the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

paymentCategory.description: A catgorisation code for a payment request

customerSpread.description: The exchange rate spread applied to the published internal exchange rates used to derive the final exchange rate to convert one currency amount ot another

customerRate.description: The exchange rate that is actually used to convert an amount from one currency to another in a payment transaction.

recordStatus.description: The status of the record processed

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS
